page.title: 03RELIGION IN CALDER VALE
page.content: There are three main denominations: {Church of England: }St John the Evangelist is the CE church and is situated next to the school at the top of Church Wood. Built of stone in the l860's it is small but well cared for by the worshippers. The churchyard is used by people of other denominations and is entered by a lych gate. There are at least two services each Sunday as well as other regular functions during the week such as the Mothers'Union. On the first Sunday each month there is a family communion service and this is usually followed by refreshments in the school. The Vicar no longer lives at the nearby vicarage but about 7 miles away at the village of Scorton where he has another church.
